display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=3% desaturation or arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 3% desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 +carba3+ caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 + marbpa3 + maropa3 + manrbpa3 + manropa3) / slpprdp
